title: Genevieve
brief_description: A captivating British comedy about two couples, classic-car enthusiasts, who, after participating in the annual London to Brighton rally challenge each other to a friendly race. Their playfulness becomes increasingly intense as they speed to the Westminster Bridge finish line. Larry Adler received an Academy Award nomination for his memorable harmonica score. Cast: Dinah Sheridan, John Gregson, Kay Kendall, Kenneth More, Geoffrey Keen, Reginald Beckwith, Arthur Wontner, Joyce Grenfell.
